Interface ICoordinate

    • Method Detail

      • setCoordinate

        int setCoordinate(int x,
                  int y)
        Set coordinate when game player clicked
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
        Returns:
        1 if assign coordinate success for the first point, 2 if assign coordinate success for the second point, 0 if otherwise

      • checkCoordinate

        java.awt.Point checkCoordinate(int x,
                               int y)
        Check the coordinates in the map
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
        Returns:
        location if the coordinates is in the map, null if otherwise
